tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE players_inventory (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR(50),
  item_type VARCHAR(20),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_gear (
    gear_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gear_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    gear_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    equipped BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_description TEXT,
    owner_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_owner FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weapons (
    weapon_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weapon_name VARCHAR(255),
    weapon_type VARCHAR(50),
    damage_points INT,
    durability INT,
    owner_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_owner FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gear (
    gear_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gear_name VARCHAR(255),
    gear_type VARCHAR(50),
    defense_points INT,
    owner_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_owner FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    equipped BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_player FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_item FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(item_id)
);
